Here the coefficients are given by \delta_{2j}(\tau)=\left.\sum_{n=-\infty}^{\infty}\sum_{\begin{subarray}{c}m=- \infty\\ \left|m\right|+\left|n\right|\neq 0\end{subarray}}^{\infty}\right.(m+n\tau)^{- 2j}, , \alpha_{2j}(\tau)=\sum_{n=-\infty}^{\infty}\sum_{m=-\infty}^{\infty}(m-\tfrac{ 1}{2}+n\tau)^{-2j}, , \beta_{2j}(\tau)=\sum_{n=-\infty}^{\infty}\sum_{m=-\infty}^{\infty}(m-\tfrac{1 }{2}+(n-\tfrac{1}{2})\tau)^{-2j}, , \gamma_{2j}(\tau)=\sum_{n=-\infty}^{\infty}\sum_{m=-\infty}^{\infty}(m+(n- \tfrac{1}{2})\tau)^{-2j}, and satisfy \alpha_{2j}(\tau)=2^{2j}\delta_{2j}(2\tau)-\delta_{2j}(\tau),\beta_{2j}(\tau)=2^{2j}\gamma_{2j}(2\tau)-\gamma_{2j}(\tau).
In the double series the order of summation is important only when j=1.
